import React from 'react' import { ShoppingState } from '../../context/ShoppingContext'; function Cart({item}) { const {DispatchShop } = ShoppingState(); return (

Name : {item.data.name}

Price : {item.data.price}

Type : {item.data.type}

Categorie : {item.data.categorie}

Quantity : {item.Quantity}

Delete : deleteProduct(item)} />

) } export default Cart
